arts.ttl: Oscar scores for Shanghai Port in 1-1 draw in Asian Champions League
arts.sum: Brazilian midfielder Oscar kept Shanghai Port on course for the Asian Champions League Elite knockout stage by scoring a second-half penalty in a 1-1 draw with South Korea’s Gwangju FC on Tuesday. “To defend against a top team like Yokohama, you all have to be willing to work, stick to the game plan, stay connected and in the first half we had players who didn’t want to do that,” Central Coast coach Mark Jackson said.
